input_text:
Job Title: Digital Designer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Quad is seeking a Digital Designer for our brand new client onsite in Modesto, CA. The Digital Designer produces digital creative solutions to address our marketing needs. To be successful in this role, you should have in-depth knowledge of graphic design, styles and layout techniques. You should also have experience executing marketing projects from conception to production, including websites, display ads, social posts and emails. Ultimately, you will ensure the design team promotes our brand through delivering high quality pieces on tight deadlines.

Key Responsibilities

Create motion graphics animations for social media useDesign and propose creative elements for visual purposes in client media collateralCreate layout comps, rough and presentation material as requestedAssist in project and/or client customer service needs. This includes direct communications with the client.Forge and execute exciting digital ideasExpected to strategize, design, and produce high-end resultsBe aware of Graphic & Advertising Trends as they relate to digital designFollowing established proofing procedures on all jobs proofing with associates as required, initial proof approval form as required. Provide additional creative client support on special projects as needed.Be directed to deliver creative elements based on specific direction by the team’s leadership or Project CoordinatorsExecute, design and propose creative elements for electronic materials editable electronic documents (PDF, Web, Interactive)Attend project meetings, will ideate with the team and will provide creative materials and ideasPropose creative concept elements for potential and new projectsAssist in project and/or client customer service needsKnowledge of digital output. Execute design layouts and revisions according to creative directionWork closely with design team as well as client’s marketing groups to collaborate on creative direction Perform other responsibilities, as they are developed/defined

Job Requirements

Appropriate education and/or experience may be substituted on an equivalent basis

Bachelor’s in Graphic Design or equivalent 2+ years of experience as a Mac Operator and Graphic Artist

Knowledge, Skills & Abilities

MAC Based hardware/software systemsExperience with motion graphics required – designing storyboards and animating for final outputKnowledge of the following software packages and languages required:Adobe CC: Photoshop, Illustrator, XD, After Effects, InDesignBasic InDesign knowledge is required due to periodic transfer of print projects to digitalAbility to create and edit animated GIFs (Photoshop, After Effects)Knowledge of HTML5 and CSS is a plusAbility to speak, read and write in the English language Ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment – work overtime as needed Ability to quickly adapt to new software tools and changes in project direction
Additional Company Information

We offer excellent benefits to eligible employees, including 401(k), holidays, vacations and more.

Quad is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and values diversity. We are committed to creating a place of belonging — a space where employees do not need to sacrifice who they are to exist and grow in our workplace. Quad does not discriminate on any unlawful basis including race, religion, color, national origin, disability, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, genetic information, or any other basis prohibited by applicable federal, state, or local laws. Quad also prohibits harassment of applicants and employees based on any of these protected categories.

Experience Level (if available): Associate
